S

saveTask(Task) - Method in class controller.Controller
This method saves a task in the file and in the database.
Since it can be a heavy task (and it's not related to the view), a thread is created.
saveTask(Task) - Static method in class controller.persistence.database.management.TaskDao
This method saves a task on the database.
saveTask(Task) - Method in class controller.persistence.FileManager
This method writes a task in a file.
saveTaskOnFile(Task) - Static method in class controller.persistence.FileManager
This method aims to save a single task on a file called report.dat: it opens/creates the file, it saves the task and it closes it.
This method has to be used only to save a task in that file and it must not be used for bulk savings.
SEGOE_UI_LIGHT - Static variable in class view.View
This is the font used to display the objects to the user.
setDelta(String) - Method in class model.Task
 
setEndTime(LocalDateTime) - Method in class model.Task
 
setLookAndFeel() - Method in class view.View
This method sets the look and feel of the program, it uses the system look and feel to make this program a little more fancy.
setStartActionListener(ActionListener) - Method in class view.View
This method sets the action listener of the start button.
setStartTime(LocalDateTime) - Method in class model.Task
 
setStopActionListener(ActionListener) - Method in class view.View
This method sets the action listener of the stop button.
setTaskDescription(String) - Method in class view.View
This method sets the task description.
setTaskName(String) - Method in class model.Task
 
showError(String, String) - Method in class view.ErrorMessage
This method shows an error.
showInfo(String, String) - Method in class view.ErrorMessage
This method shows an info.
showMessage(String, String, int) - Method in class view.ErrorMessage
This method shows a message to the user.
showWarning(String, String) - Method in class view.ErrorMessage
This method shows a warning.
start - Variable in class view.View
This is the button used to start the timer to count the time of a task.
startClock(View) - Method in class controller.Controller
This method initialize the "clock" which is the timer that counts the time of a task.
startNow(View) - Method in class controller.Controller
This method initialize the "now" clock which is just a simple clock that shows the output of now.
startTime - Variable in class model.Task
 
stop - Variable in class view.View
This is the button used to stop the timer to count the time of a task and used to save the tasks in the database and in the file.
stopClock() - Method in class controller.Controller
This method stops the timer that counts the time of a task.
